page.title: 07CHIPPENHAM PRIMARY SCHOOLS
page.content: There are three schools for primary aged children in this block,although Chippenham Town itself has nine,along with two schools for children aged eleven to eighteen. On the Monkton Park Estate there is {Monkton Park Primary School,}a modern brick built school in its own grounds. It had 126 children on roll in January 1985. In the older part of Chippenham near the town centre there is{Westmead {Infants School}and{Westmead Junior {School.}These schools are in older buildings. They have about 170 children between them. All these schools are maintained by{Wiltshire {County Council Education Department.
